thread.title: Lucian

author: Lucian
title: Lucian
text: Having recently a very bad online customer experience with an Italian famous brand, Moleskine, I was cautious and skeptical at my first attempt with otticanet. Yet as the site selection was excellent, including my favorite Kuboraum, I gave it a try and didnt regret. Perfect shopping experience, fast and reliable. And in comparison with moleskine.com which most probably is using 19th Century starved horses as postal services, otticanet delivered promptly and made me happy. Therrefore I think it worth my time spent writing this reply, instead of a simple Grazie mille!
